attributes.action: ban T.C.P ltd and other private companys to place tickets on cars and talk to the public like crap
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i am calling on all people to ban T.C.P ltd and private companys from giving tickets and only local councils to be able to do this job. as tcp and others post parking notices when no notice placed on the car.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
